explains: n. 毁灭；溃败；（物理）湮灭，湮没
wordGroup: positron annihilation 正电子湮没；阳电子湮没

sentences.en: This company has to be given credit for her ultimate annihilation.
sentences.cn: 公司曾经借贷给她，最后她被公司辞退。

sentences.en: Will the mutual annihilation and conversion to pure energy destroy the world?
sentences.cn: 它们的相互湮灭会转化为纯粹的能量而毁灭世界吗？

sentences.en: The new collider has to provide exact measurements of electron-positron annihilation.
sentences.cn: 新型的对撞机必须提供电子-正电子湮灭的准确测量结果。
